text.0: when shall our prayers rest in thy car beside thee when dost thou give the singer food for thousands.
text.1: when wilt thou clothe this poets laud with plenty and when wilt thou enrich our hymns with booty.
text.2: when wilt thou gatber men with men o indra heroes with heroes and prevail in combat.
text.3: thou shalt win triply kine in frays for cattle so indra give thou us celestial glory.
text.4: yea when wilt thou o indra thou most mighty make the prayer allsustaining for the singer.
text.5: when wilt thou yoke as we yoke songs thy horses and come to offerings that bring wealth in cattle.
text.6: grant to the singer food with store of cattle splendid with horses and the fame of riches.
text.7: send food to swell the milchcow good at milking bright be its shine among the bharadvājas.
text.8: lead otherwise this present foeman Śakra hence art thou praised as hero foe destroyer.
text.9: him who gives pure gifts may i praise unceasing sage quicken the aṅgirases by devotion.
